channel.title: OnOptions

item.description: Marketers spend millions perfecting targeting and creative, but then lose the customer.

item.title: American Jews, Chinese food and Christmas: The first connection was a 1935 gift of chow mein to a New Jersey orphanage
item.description: Elena Kagan was asked where she was on Christmas during her Supreme Court confirmation: “Like all Jews, I was probably at a Chinese restaurant.”

item.title: Neuroscience Explains How and Why Humans Should Hibernate a Little in Winter
item.description: You’re not just lazy or tired in winter. Your body wants you to show down and recharge. So go ahead and (semi) hibernate.
